name: am-business-system
description: AM Business System - Monorepo for DMS and Landing pages

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd home/landing && npm install && cd ../../DMS/frontend && npm install && cd ../portal && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run dev:landing" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run start:backend" --names "LANDING,FRONTEND,PORTAL,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow,red"
